title: Elon Musk’s xAI restricts Grok after outcry over sexualised images
description: Start-up limits use of image generation system to paid users following spread of deepfakes and child sex abuse material
content: Start-up limits use of image generation system to paid users following spread of deepfakes and child sex abuse material
